data.title: The Best Private Beatles Tours in Liverpool
data.meta_description: For your Beatles Tour Liverpool, choose Liverpool Beatles Tours, from 3 hour Beatles tours to an all day personalised tour of Liverpool visiting the best Beatles locations possible.

Liverpool Beatles Tours - Established 2004

Part of the C and I Travel Ltd. Group

ABOUT THE COMPANY

Liverpool Beatles Tours Ltd. has been providing personalised Beatles tours in Liverpool since 2004.

We have welcomed fans from all over the world: USA, Canada, South America, Australia, Europe, South Africa and Asia.

Our aim is to give you the tour you deserve.

Terms and Conditions

Contact Beatles Tours Testimonials About

VIP BEATLES TOURS FOR BEATLES AFICIONADOS

With author David Bedford, these tours are unique to us

SPECIALIST TOURS

Second World War, 800 Years in a Day and the American Connections

OUT OF LIVERPOOL

Take a trip to the Lake District or into North Wales - so much to discover

On our All Day Tour and VIP Silver and Gold Tours, you get the chance to go inside the childhood homes of John Lennon at Mendips (above) and Paul McCartney at 20, Forthlin Road. These homes are operated by the National Trust, and we can include this tour within your Beatles tour. The houses are not open every day so check with us first.

Advice for YOUR Beatles Tour: Get your trip of a lifetime right!

If you are planning your trip to Liverpool, and want a Beatles tour, then you will be taken to see:

where Ringo Starr and George Harrison were born, where John Lennon lived with his Aunt Mimi at âMendipsâ and where Paul lived at 20, Forthlin Road.

One of the hidden gems of the Beatlesâ Liverpool, you need to visit the Casbah Coffee Club, the true âbirthplace of The Beatlesâ.

Go on a private tour and discover the incredible stories, with the club that John, Paul and George helped to paint - and you can still see their artwork. Donât miss it.

You will also see Brian Epsteinâs home, Penny Lane, St. Peterâs where John and Paul met, and Strawberry Field. You could take a quick bus tour or in a taxi too and see the popular places.

However, we donât believe in giving you the tour we want, but the tour YOU want.

We are different.

Thatâs why our Beatles tours have been designed by David Bedford, author of the only book on The Beatles and Liverpool: âLiddypool: Birthplace of The Beatlesâ. We even have VIP tours where David can accompany you. One tour doesnât fit all. We have several unique options, so that you can choose the Beatles tour that YOU want: just tell us where to go!

Spoiled for choice? Use our Tour Planner to tell us what you would like to do and we will recommend the best tour for you. Why Liverpool Beatles Tours? We were chosen by Paul McCartneyâs film team to help with the pre-tour film on his âBack in the Worldâ tour, and showed May Pang, John Lennonâs former girlfriend, around Liverpool too.

One of our vehicles - Travel in luxury with us in our air-conditioned Mercedes (right)

Or choose a cheaper option in a Taxi for a Fab Four taxi tour

BOOK NOW

Welcome to Liverpool Beatles Tours

âIt was 20 years ago todayâ, as The Beatles sang. Well, 20 years ago, Liverpool Beatles Tours was founded and weâve looked after hundreds of satisfied Beatles fans on their Beatles pilgrimage.

We offer UNIQUE Beatles Tours.

NOTE: Other local tour companies are âpretendingâ to be Liverpool Beatles Tours when they arenât! We are the one and only Liverpool Beatles Tours, founded in 2003.

Just contact us with any questions and we will happy to take you on your own private Beatles tour.

BRAND NEW
